name: First Light (itch)
description:
First Light captures the primal sense of safety and comfort found when humans first tamed fire. The nights were no longer full of such hidden dangers and nightmarish fears. This game presents the struggle and effort one would take in order to keep this gift alive as the cold night creeps in, and whatever may come with it.

Wired Xbox Controller required

This was a 5 week project between 3 game developers.

Vc Penguin - Game designer, project manager and lead artist.
Mitchell Pryor - Lead programmer
Sholto Tiger Collins - UI programmer and

Trees, ground panels, mountains, some rocks, fireplace - Low Poly Adventure Pack
